title: IIT Patna Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Assistant Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Patna (IIT Patna) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Patna Notification 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
